# allowsPredictiveKeyboard

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether to enable the predictive keyboard during an assessment.

## Declaration

```swift
var allowsPredictiveKeyboard: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Users can turn on the Predictive Keyboard feature in the Settings app (General > Keyboard). An assessment session disables this feature by default, but you can allow it by setting [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentConfiguration/allowsPredictiveKeyboard] to `true` in the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentConfiguration] instance that you use to initialize a session.

## Allowing typing assistance

- **allowsContinuousPathKeyboard**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to allow Slide to Type to operate during an assessment.
- **allowsKeyboardShortcuts**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to allow keyboard shortcuts during an assessment.
- **allowsPasswordAutoFill**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to allow password autofill during an assessment.
